title: Portfolio Website v1 (Flask)
description: The first version of my personal portfolio, developed using Flask, Bootstrap 5, and vanilla JavaScript. Itâ€™s a simple yet functional site to showcase my work, fully deployed and maintained on my own Linux server using Nginx.

title: Portfolio Website v2 (Angular)
description: The second iteration of my portfolio website, built using Angular, Bootstrap 5, Swiper.js, and JavaScript. It includes animations and improved UI/UX, deployed on my own server with Nginx and Linux.

title: ALX Low-Level Programming
description: A collection of low-level programming projects from the ALX Software Engineering program. It covers core concepts like memory management, pointers, data structures, recursion, file I/O, and basic algorithms. All code follows the Betty style and is compiled using gcc on Ubuntu.

title: ALX Higher-Level Programming
description: A collection of Python and JavaScript projects completed as part of the ALX Software Engineering program. Covers core programming concepts including OOP, data structures, exceptions, inheritance, file I/O, APIs, web scraping, and SQL. Code follows PEP 8 guidelines and is organized by topic for structured learning.

title: ALX System Engineering & DevOps
description: Projects covering core system engineering and DevOps skills from the ALX Software Engineering program. Topics include shell scripting, permissions, networking, SSH, firewalls, server setup, web infrastructure, APIs, and monitoring. Designed to build strong foundations in IT operations and automation.

title: Printf Function Clone in C
description: A custom implementation of the C standard printf function, developed as part of the ALX Software Engineering program. Supports various format specifiers and replicates core functionality of the original for formatted output handling.

title: Binary Trees in C
description: A comprehensive project implementing various operations on binary trees in C, including traversal, insertion, deletion, balance checking, AVL trees, and binary search trees. Developed as part of the ALX Software Engineering program.

title: Sorting Algorithms in C
description: An educational project focused on implementing classic sorting algorithms in C, such as Bubble Sort, Insertion Sort, and Selection Sort. Includes visualization helpers for arrays and linked lists. Built as part of the ALX Software Engineering program.

title: LeetCode Java Solutions
description: A public GitHub repository containing all my Java solutions to LeetCode challenges. This project demonstrates my problem-solving skills and commitment to continuous learning in data structures and algorithms.

title: Match Management API
description: A backend RESTful API built with Java and Spring Boot to manage games, teams, players, referees, and stadiums. Includes Dockerized MySQL setup and Postman collections for testing.

title: HTML Template One
description: A responsive website template created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Hosted on GitHub Pages and designed for fast loading and clean layout.

title: HTML Template Two
description: Another modern and clean website template made with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Deployed on GitHub Pages for easy access and sharing.
